Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Harlem
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Harlem due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Harlem due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
